name: @orca-pt/orca-components
description: Orca native components for rendering special content markers in Vue applications

scripts.version:sync: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));const index=fs.readFileSync('src/index.ts','utf8');const updated=index.replace(/version: \"[\d.]+\"/,`version: \"${pkg.version}\"`);fs.writeFileSync('src/index.ts',updated);console.log('✅ Synced version to',pkg.version);"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run version:sync
scripts.dev:install: npm run build && npm pack && cd ../teams/gptclone-panel && pnpm remove @orcapt/orca-components && pnpm add ../../lexia-components-package/orca-orca-components-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.quick-deploy: npm run build && npm pack && cd ../teams/gptclone-panel && pnpm remove @orcapt/orca-components && pnpm add ../../lexia-components-package/orca-orca-components-1.0.0.tgz && echo '✅ Package deployed successfully!'
